title: Design bundled binary + home isolation plan
description: Define the opt-in app-bundled binary contract (no PATH/CODEX_BINARY reliance): bundle layout, version pin/update expectations, and how host apps should select per-project CODEX_HOME roots and place auth files. Capture how the wrapper should expose a helper without changing current defaults.
outputs: Design note/doc comments committed to repo

title: Implement bundled binary resolver helper
description: Add an opt-in helper to resolve a pinned app-scoped Codex binary (bundle root + version), fail fast when missing, and keep behavior isolated from the user's global install. Keep default behavior unchanged unless the helper is used.

title: Docs/examples for bundled binary + home/auth flow
description: Document the recommended bundled flow (app-scoped binary path, per-project CODEX_HOME, auth file placement/copy guidance) and add/update examples to show the new helper and isolation pattern. Make it clear this is additive to existing env-based selection.

title: Auth seeding helper for bundled/isolated homes
description: Add an opt-in helper to seed Codex auth into an app-scoped CODEX_HOME for bundled/isolated flows. Support copying auth.json and .credentials.json from a trusted seed home into a target home (no history/logs), surface clear errors when sources are missing or unsafe, and keep existing defaults untouched. Update docs/examples to show the helper alongside resolve_bundled_binary and per-project homes.
